DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , open label , single arm , observational multicenter study assess correlation PEST SCORAD score management AD Ceradan® regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Study Between PEST SCORAD Management Atopic Dermatitis With Ceradan® Regimen
DOC.detailed_description: All eligible patient shall apply permitted topical steroid ( ) accord standard local practice For entire study period , patient apply Ceradan Cream® liberally twice daily , require use non-soap base wash twice daily . At screen visit , patient receive diary card ask track atopic dermatitis symptom 12 week . Retrospective information topical treatment use collected baseline .
